name: Screenchart
description:
Global Game Jam 2021 Submission from team Rad Dragons.

In this four-player online multiplayer game (yes, really), players have to use their map and find the treasure on the mystical island! Look at each others' maps and steal their treasure instead for more points!

The first player with five points wins!

Use Left mouse button to view map.
Use Right mouse button to dig.

Installing:

1. Download the build

2. Unzip the build

3. Launch RadDragons2021.exe

Playing notes:

1. Make sure you enter a name

2. Make sure you have the same room name as your friends

3. Stand in the red circle together to start the game!

The team:

Dirk de Kok

Anette Vávrova

Joaquín Aguilera Valdebenito

Roy Bomhof
